lines.text: Who said, "Family life is an invasion of one's privacy"?
What meaning can a love story have in this ruin, this corruption?
It's the corrupt ones who need a love story most.
What some people will do for ice cream.
Do all your cocktail parties have this sectarian air? Everybody acts like they're being spied on.
It used to be the poor who wanted to emigrate from Italy. Now it's the rich.
People have reasons for going out at night, futile or otherwise, but we're quick to call them bandits because we suspect them for emotional reasons of our own.
He's got a face that made Heine say, "As sad as a German two days dead."
